title: Carved in Bone
description: Was Bill Ryan's death an accident? Henry Rios has his doubts.The first new Henry Rios novel in 20 years from six-time Lambda Literary award winner Michael Nava is a brilliantly plotted mystery that weaves together the gripping story of two gay men against the backdrop of 1980s San Francisco as the tsunami of AIDS bears down upon the city.
author: Michael Nava
